features.title: Why Heartline Songsmith?
features.subtitle: The perfect gift, delivered at the speed of inspiration
features.description: We turn your inside jokes, memories, and one-of-a-kind stories into a custom, radio-quality song and a personalized music video—fast.

lightning_fast.title: Lightning Fast Delivery
lightning_fast.description: Our AI-assisted workflow means you can go from idea to finished song and video in less than a day. Perfect for the anniversary or birthday you *almost* forgot.

radically_personal.title: Radically Personal
radically_personal.description: This isn't a generic template. Our system helps you tell your unique story, and our artists craft it into a professional track that could only be for them.

forever_keepsake.title: A Forever Keepsake
forever_keepsake.description: You don't just get an MP3. You get a 'Heartline Hits on GWPTV' Premier Vid—a personalized music video you can share and relive forever.

process.title: A Modern Process for a Personal Gift
process.subtitle: We've combined a simple, fun creative brief with powerful AI and real artistic talent to make something magical, fast.

step1.title: Tell Your Story
step1.description: Fill out our smart Intake Form. It's a fun, guided process that takes minutes and captures the key details, mood, and genre for your song.

step2.title: Approve the Vision
step2.description: Moments later, you'll receive a 'Track Vision' PDF. It includes a creative summary and a draft of the lyrics so you can be sure we've nailed the direction.

step3.title: Get Your Hit Song & Vid
step3.description: Once approved, our artists record the song and our automated system generates your custom 'Premier Vid,' ready to share in hours.

what_you_get.title: More Than a Song. It's a Moment.
what_you_get.subtitle: Every Heartline Songsmith order is a complete, shareable experience, delivered digitally for instant gifting.

custom_song.title: Broadcast-Quality Custom Song
custom_song.description: A professionally written, recorded, and mastered track based on your story. Delivered as a high-quality MP3 & WAV file.

premier_vid.title: The 'Premier Vid' Experience
premier_vid.description: A personalized music video featuring an intro from a GWPTV VJ host, a summary of your song's creative vision, and a full, dynamic lyric video.

pricing.title: Choose Your Perfect Hit
pricing.subtitle: From a simple, heartfelt track to a full-blown viral-ready package, find the perfect way to tell your story and create an unforgettable gift.

testimonial.title: A Gift That Truly Hit the Mark
testimonial.quote: I completely forgot our anniversary was this week. I filled out the form during my lunch break, and by that evening, I had this incredible song and video. My wife was floored. The VJ intro was hilarious and the song was perfect. I went from zero to hero in less than 8 hours.
testimonial.author: David L., San Francisco, CA

cta.title: Ready to Become a Gifting Legend?
cta.subtitle: Your story is waiting for its soundtrack. The process is fast, the result is timeless. Let's make something unforgettable.

question1.question: How can you create a song so fast?
question1.answer: Our secret is a 'human-in-the-loop' system. We use AI to accelerate the administrative and drafting steps—like creating your Track Vision—which allows our human artists to focus exclusively on what they do best: making incredible music.

question2.question: What is the 'Premier Vid'?
question2.answer: It's a personalized music video experience! Our automated system creates a video that feels like an MTV-style world premiere, featuring a VJ host that matches your song's genre, a peek behind the creative curtain, and a full lyric video so you can sing along.

question3.question: Do I get to give feedback?
question3.answer: Yes! The 'Track Vision' document is your chance to make sure we've captured the lyrical direction and overall vibe perfectly. Once you approve it, our team gets to work on the final production.
